member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298
member.summary: A motor controller used to control two different motors.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MoveMotor(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to set a motor's speed. The motor you are setting the speed for. The new speed that you want to set the current motor to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MoveMotorRamp(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to set a motor's speed with a ramping acceleration. The motor you are setting the speed for. The new speed that you want to set the current motor to. The time in which you want the motor to reach the new speed (in milliseconds).

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MoveMotorRampNonBlocking(Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to set a motor's speed with a ramping acceleration asynchronously. The motor you are setting the speed for. The new speed that you want to set the current motor to. The time in which you want the motor to reach the new speed (in milliseconds).

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Frequency
member.summary: Used to set the PWM frequency for the motors because some motors require a certain frequency in order to operate properly. It defaults to 25KHz (25000).

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MotorControllerL298State
member.summary: Represents the state of the object.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MotorControllerL298State.Low
member.summary: The state of MotorControllerL298 is low.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.MotorControllerL298State.High
member.summary: The state of MotorControllerL298 is high.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor
member.summary: Represents the desired motor to use.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor.Motor1
member.summary: The left motor, marked M1, is the one in use.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MotorControllerL298.Motor.Motor2
member.summary: The right motor, marked M2, is the one in use.
